title: Shares slide as U.S. probe Hyundai air bag failures
text:
Shares slide as U.S. probe Hyundai air bag failures 6:49am EDT - 01:11 
Shares in Hyundai Motor tumbled on Monday on a U.S. probe into why air bags failed to deploy in some of its Sonata sedans, with investors fretting about potential recall costs for the once popular cars.   
Shares in Hyundai Motor tumbled on Monday on a U.S. probe into why air bags failed to deploy in some of its Sonata sedans, with investors fretting about potential recall costs for the once popular cars.  //reut.rs/2IBgqdM
